bibl.title: Running a boat in Ptolemaic Egypt: P. Cairo Zen. 4 59649, a reassessment
bibl.seg: Nick Vaneerdewegh, Running a Boat in Ptolemaic Egypt: P. Cairo Zen. 4 59649, a Reassessment.

1. Captains, owners and ναύκληροι. - 2. Text of P. Cairo Zen. IV, 59649 (TM 1280) with translation. - 3. Previous interpretations of P. Cairo Zen. IV, 59649. - 4. The tax, total gross, and the verso of P. Cairo Zen. IV, 59649. - 5. A new interpretation of the writer's propositions. - Conclusion: The economic significance of P. Cairo Zen. IV, 59649. - Appendix: previous interpretations of P. Cairo Zen. IV, 59649.
